name: Muttville Senior Dog Rescue - Seniors for Seniors
description: Free adoption of senior dogs (7+ years) for seniors 62+
fullDescription: Muttville's Seniors for Seniors program offers free adoptions of senior dogs (7+ years) to seniors 62 and older, helping both seniors and dogs find companionship.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free adoption of senior dogs (7 years and older)
- All dogs are spayed/neutered and vaccinated
- Behavioral assessment completed
- Ongoing support after adoption
- Return policy if it doesn't work out
howToGetIt:
1. Must be 62 years or older
2. Visit Muttville's website to view adoptable senior dogs
3. Complete an adoption application
4. Meet with dogs at Muttville or adoption events
5. Take home your new companion at no cost
keywords: Muttville, Seniors for Seniors, free adoption, senior dog, adopt dog, seniors 62+, San Francisco, companion pet, older dog
